description: The Stoneham Mountain Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Stoneham Mountain Resort for the snow report
Alexa, ask Stoneham Mountain Resort for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Stoneham Mountain Resort
shortDescription: The Stoneham Mountain Resort Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Stoneham Mountain Resort.
